org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.data.field

Interface FieldVisibilityHandler<RowType,FieldType>

  • Type Parameters:
    RowType -
    FieldType -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FieldWriter<RowType,FieldType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayWrapperWriter, ArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.FixedSizeObjectArrayWriter, ArrayWriter.VariableSizeObjectArrayWriter, BasicWriter, BigDecimalSerializationProvider.BigDecimalWriter, BigIntegerSerializationProvider.BigIntegerWriter, BooleanSerializationProvider.BooleanWriter, ByteArraySerializationProvider.ByteArrayWriter, ByteSerializationProvider.ByteWriter, CalendarSerializationProvider.CalendarWriter, DateSerializationProvider.DateWriter, DoubleSerializationProvider.DoubleWriter, FieldLevelVisibilityHandler, FloatSerializationProvider.FloatWriter, GeometrySerializationProvider.GeometryWriter, GeometryWrapperWriter, GeoWaveAvroFeatureWriter, GlobalVisibilityHandler, IntegerSerializationProvider.IntegerWriter, LongSerializationProvider.LongWriter, PersistableWriter, RasterTileWriter, ShortSerializationProvider.ShortWriter, SimpleFeatureSerializationProvider.WholeFeatureWriter, StringSerializationProvider.StringWriter, TimeWriter, UnconstrainedVisibilityHandler

    public interface FieldVisibilityHandler<RowType,FieldType>
    This class must be implemented to perform per field value visibility decisions. The byte array that is returned will be used directly in the visibility column for Accumulo.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getVisibility(RowType rowValue, String fieldName, FieldType fieldValue)
      Determine visibility on a per field basis.

    • Method Detail

      • getVisibility

        byte[] getVisibility(RowType rowValue,
                     String fieldName,
                     FieldType fieldValue)
        Determine visibility on a per field basis.
        Parameters:
        rowValue - The value for the full row.
        fieldName - The ID of the field for which to determine visibility
        fieldValue - The value of the field to determine visibility
        Returns:
        The visibility for a field
